Sequence Information.Family: Belongs to the lantibiotics family (Class I bacteriocin)
Sequence Information.Hemolytic Activity: No hemolysis information or data found in the reference(s) presented in this entry
Sequence Information.Structure Description: There are three lanthionines (between residues 3-7; 8-11; 19-24) and three methyllanthionines rings (between residues 16-20; 23-28; 30-36).
Sequence Information.Comments: No comments found on DRAMP database

Literature.Title: Structural characterization of the highly cyclized lantibiotic paenicidin A via a partial desulfurization/reduction strategy.
Literature.Author: Lohans CT, Huang Z, van Belkum MJ, Giroud M, Sit CS, Steels EM, Zheng J, Whittal RM, McMullen LM, Vederas JC.

Literature.Title: Biochemical, structural, and genetic characterization of tridecaptin A?, an antagonist of Campylobacter jejuni.
Literature.Author: Lohans CT, van Belkum MJ, Cochrane SA, Huang Z, Sit CS, McMullen LM, Vederas JC.
